description:
DIGITAL FANTASY SPORTS (DFS) describes itself as a premium blockchain eSports arcade and fantasy sports gaming token. DFS is used as an in-game currency to create a transparent network built on smart contracts. Digital Fantasy Sports offers games in three categories: DIGITAL FANTASY SPORTS (DFS) describes itself as a premium blockchain eSports arcade and fantasy sports gaming token. DFS is used as an in-game currency to create a transparent network built on smart contracts. Digital Fantasy Sports offers games in three categories:
  • Fantasy Sports
  • Casino
  • eSports.
name: Digital Fantasy Sports
